title: 求大神帮帮忙啊！（标题为什么一定要长呢？我这个标题好像就很长...）
author: 天命小猪
txt_content:
本帖最后由 天命小猪 于 2013-5-26 10:50 编辑 

我是小猪！
我要在我的客户端里安装工业MOD，
我的客户端里有这几个MOD：
工业2（装了就崩溃）、二战、小地图、伤害显示，
版本是1.4.7。
可是装了工业就成这样了：
Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      


Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem; Failed to start game


A full error report has been saved to D:\MC\节操小镇服务器\客户端\minecraft\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2013-05-24_20.54.41-client.txt - Please include a copy of that file (Not this screen!) if you report this crash to anyone; without it, they will not be able to help fix the crash :(






--- BEGIN ERROR REPORT 3ba3f6f6 --------
Full report at:
D:\MC\节操小镇服务器\客户端\minecraft\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2013-05-24_20.54.41-client.txt
Please show that file to Mojang, NOT just this screen!


Generated 13-5-24 下午8:54

据说是ID的问题......
还有，我弄完客户端我还要把二战装到服务端里，
我真的非常想玩这两个MOD啊！
求大神帮帮忙啊！！！！！！！！！！！！
